title: league keeps minimizing itself ingame
body:
hi, when im in a game of league, my game keeps randomly minimizing itself every 2-3 minutes or so. 
i have no programs running in the background, and im running a fairly shitty resolution. 
does anyone know why this is happening or how to fix it?

replies.body:
Do you have a windows key on your keyboard? That annoying key os in the worst spot & always gets pressed at the worst possible times.

Most gaming keyboards have a switch or button on them that lets u turn it off. Otherwise google & there is a regedit you can do to disable it.
You shouldn't press alt and tab at the same time.
